block.p: BASKETBALL National Basketball Association NETS - Waived G Chris Robinson. ATLANTA HAWKS - Signed F Stephen Howard. BOSTON CELTICS - Waived F Rodney Elliott and G Jason Miskiri. Continental Basketball Association CBA- Awarded Idaho a 2001 eighth-round draft pick from Connecticut. Suspended Connecticut coach Tyler Jones for one game for tampering. FORT WAYNE FURY - Signed G Artie Griffin and F Alvin Jefferson.

BASKETBALL National Basketball Association NETS - Waived G Chris Robinson. ATLANTA HAWKS - Signed F Stephen Howard. BOSTON CELTICS - Waived F Rodney Elliott and G Jason Miskiri. Continental Basketball Association CBA- Awarded Idaho a 2001 eighth-round draft pick from Connecticut. Suspended Connecticut coach Tyler Jones for one game for tampering. FORT WAYNE FURY - Signed G Artie Griffin and F Alvin Jefferson.

FOOTBALL National Football League JETS - Signed WR-PR Shannon Myers to the practice squad. BALITMORE RAVENS - Signed LS John Hudson. Place TE Frank Wainright on injured reserve. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS - Placed OT Zach Wiegert on injured reserve. Signed TE Ryan Neufeld. Activated OT Reggie Nelson from the practice squad.

HOCKEY National Hockey League RANGERS - Recalled defenseman Mike Mottau from Hartford of the American Hockey League and reassigned defenseman Drew Bannister to the minor league affiliate. BOSTON BRUINS - Fired Pat Burns, coach. Named Mike Kennan coach. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS - Activated C Espen Knutsen from the injured list. DALLAS STARS - Activated C Shaun Van Allen from the injured list. SAN JOSE SHARKS - Assigned D Greg Andrusak to Kentucky of the AHL. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING - Claimed D Craig Millar off waivers from the Nashville Predators. Placed D Sergey Gusev on injured reserve.
SOCCER Major League Soccer METROSTARS - Signed MF Daniel Hernandez to a four-year contract.

COLLEGE PACE - Named Jon Hockberg women's assistant basketball coach. SOUTH FLORIDA - Suspended women's basketball coach Jerry Ann Winters indefinitely after an in-house investigation found evidence she retaliated against a black player who complained of racism.
